How to build SEO friendly websites in React? Building an SEO-friendly website in React requires careful planning and implementation. Here are some tips to help you get started:
Use React Server-Side Rendering (SSR): One of the main challenges with React is that it is a client-side rendering (CSR) framework, which means that search engines may not be able to crawl and index your website's content properly. SSR is the process of rendering your React application on the server-side, which allows search engines to crawl and index your content.Use a dynamic sitemap: A sitemap is a file that lists all the pages on your website. A dynamic sitemap can help search engines discover new pages on your website as you add them.Optimize your page titles and meta descriptions: Each page on your website should have a unique, descriptive title tag and meta description. These tags help search engines understand what your page is about and can improve your click-through rate (CTR) in search results.Use semantic HTML: Semantic HTML is HTML that has meaning beyond just visual presentation. Using semantic HTML can help search engines understand the structure of your content and improve your website's accessibility.Optimize your images: Images can have a significant impact on your website's performance and SEO. Make sure to compress your images and use descriptive alt tags to help search engines understand what your images are about.Use internal linking: Internal linking is the process of linking to other pages on your website. This can help search engines understand the structure of your website and improve the user experience.Monitor your website's performance: Regularly monitoring your website's performance can help you identify and fix any issues that may be impacting your website's SEO.By following these tips and best practices, you can build an SEO-friendly website in React that is optimized for both search engines and users.
How to build SEO friendly websites in React?
title: How to build SEO friendly websites in React?

How to implement Server Side rendering(SSR) in React? Implementing server-side rendering (SSR) in React requires a few steps. Here's an overview of the process:
Choose a server-side rendering solution: There are several SSR solutions available for React, including Next.js, Gatsby, and After.js. Choose the one that best fits your needs.Set up your server: You'll need to set up a server to handle the SSR requests. This could be a Node.js server or a serverless function.Create your React components: Create your React components as you normally would. However, you'll need to make sure that any code that relies on the browser environment (such as window or document) is handled properly.Implement SSR in your application: Depending on the SSR solution you've chosen, you'll need to implement the necessary code to handle server-side rendering. For example, with Next.js, you'll need to create a pages directory and add server-side rendering code to the _app.js file.Test your SSR implementation: Test your SSR implementation to make sure everything is working properly. You may need to make adjustments to your code to ensure that it works correctly with SSR.By following these steps, you can implement server-side rendering in your React application. Keep in mind that SSR can have a significant impact on your application's performance and SEO, so it's worth taking the time to do it right.
How to implement Server Side rendering(SSR) in React?
title: How to implement Server Side rendering(SSR) in React?

How to prevent heart attack? There are several steps you can take to reduce your risk of having a heart attack:
Quit smoking: Smoking is a major risk factor for heart disease. Quitting smoking can help improve your heart health.Maintain a healthy weight: Being overweight or obese can increase your risk of heart disease. Maintaining a healthy weight through regular exercise and a balanced diet can help lower your risk.Exercise regularly: Exercise is good for your heart and can help reduce your risk of heart disease. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise most days of the week.Eat a heart-healthy diet: A diet that is high in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and low-fat dairy can help improve your heart health.Control your blood pressure: High blood pressure can increase your risk of heart disease. Talk to your doctor about ways to manage your blood pressure, such as through medication or lifestyle changes.Manage stress: Chronic stress can contribute to heart disease. Finding healthy ways to manage stress, such as through exercise, meditation, or talking with a counselor, can help reduce your risk.Limit alcohol consumption: Drinking too much alcohol can increase your blood pressure and contribute to other risk factors for heart disease. If you choose to drink, do so in moderation.Control your cholesterol: High cholesterol can contribute to the buildup of plaque in your arteries, which can increase your risk of heart disease. Talk to your doctor about ways to manage your cholesterol, such as through medication or lifestyle changes.
How to prevent heart attack?
title: How to prevent heart attack?

Soil Moisture SensorsWeather StationsDronesLivestock Wearable DevicesPrecision Irrigation SystemsCrop Monitoring CamerasSmart Greenhouse ControllersTractor-mounted sensorsRemote Monitoring SystemsLivestock Feed Dispensers.These devices can be used to monitor various aspects of agricultural operations, including soil conditions, weather patterns, crop growth, livestock health, and water usage. By collecting and analyzing data from these devices, farmers can make informed decisions to improve efficiency, productivity, and sustainability.

What is IoT, what are IoT devices, why its important in today’s generation? What is IoT?
IoT (Internet of Things) refers to a network of physical devices, vehicles, home appliances and other items embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and connectivity which enables these objects to connect and exchange data. The IoT allows for the seamless exchange of information between devices and systems, enabling new levels of automation, optimization, and efficiency in various industries and aspects of daily life.
What are IoT devices
IoT (Internet of Things) devices are connected objects that collect, transmit and act on data they gather through internet connectivity. Examples include smart home devices (smart thermostats, security cameras, smart locks, etc.), wearable devices (smartwatches, fitness trackers), industrial devices (sensors, machines), and others.
Why IoT is important in today's generation?
IoT is important in today's generation because it:
Improves efficiency and productivity by automating processes and tasks.Enables real-time data collection and analysis, leading to better decision making.Facilitates the development of smart cities, homes, and healthcare systems.Offers new and innovative solutions for various industries such as agriculture, transportation, and manufacturing.Enhances people's lifestyles and experiences through connected devices and services.Promotes energy efficiency and sustainability through monitoring and control of resources.Overall, IoT is changing the way we live and work, making our lives easier, safer, and more efficient.
What is IoT, what are IoT devices, why its important in today's generation?
title: What is IoT, what are IoT devices, why its important in today's generation?

Biography - APJ Abdul Kalam APJ Abdul Kalam, also known as Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, was an Indian scientist and politician who served as the 11th President of India from 2002 to 2007. He is widely regarded as the "Missile Man of India" for his work on the development of ballistic missile technology.
Kalam was born on October 15, 1931, in Rameswaram, Tamil Nadu, India. He came from a humble background, and his father was a boat owner. Despite financial struggles, Kalam was an excellent student, and he went on to graduate with a degree in physics from Saint Joseph's College in Tiruchirappalli.
After graduation, Kalam joined the Aeronautical Development Establishment of the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) as a scientist. He worked on the development of ballistic missiles, including the successful launch of the Rohini satellite in 1980.
In the 1980s, Kalam became the chief executive of the Integrated Guided Missile Development Programme (IGMDP), which aimed to develop a comprehensive range of missiles. Under his leadership, the programme was successful in developing the Prithvi, Akash, Trishul, and Nag missiles.
In addition to his work in missile development, Kalam also made significant contributions to India's civilian space programme, including the development of the Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle (PSLV) and the Geosynchronous Satellite Launch Vehicle (GSLV).
Kalam's contributions to science and technology were recognized with numerous awards and honors, including the Padma Bhushan in 1981 and the Padma Vibhushan in 1990. He also received the Bharat Ratna, India's highest civilian award, in 1997.
In 2002, Kalam was elected as the 11th President of India, becoming the first scientist and the first person from the state of Tamil Nadu to hold the office. He served as president until 2007 and was widely popular among the people.
After his term as president, Kalam returned to his life as a scientist and educator. He continued to inspire and mentor young people, particularly in the fields of science and technology. He also wrote several books, including "Wings of Fire" and "Ignited Minds."
Kalam passed away on July 27, 2015, while delivering a lecture at the Indian Institute of Management in Shillong. He was 84 years old. He is widely remembered and respected in India as a visionary leader and an inspiration to young people.
Biography - APJ Abdul Kalam
title: Biography - APJ Abdul Kalam

Biography - Dhirubhai Ambani Dhirubhai Ambani was an Indian businessman and founder of Reliance Industries, one of India's largest conglomerates. He is considered one of India's most prominent and successful entrepreneurs, and is often referred to as the "King of Indian Industry."
Ambani was born on December 28, 1932, in Chorwad, Gujarat, India. He came from a humble background, and his father was a school teacher. Despite limited resources, Ambani was determined to succeed, and he began his career as a clerk in a local oil company.
In 1958, Ambani decided to start his own business, and with a small investment, he began importing polyester yarn and selling it in India. This proved to be a successful venture, and Ambani quickly expanded his business to include other products, such as textiles, plastics, and chemicals.
In 1977, Ambani founded Reliance Industries, which would go on to become one of India's largest and most successful companies. The company's primary focus was on textiles, but it also expanded into other areas such as petrochemicals, telecommunications, and energy.
Ambani was known for his business acumen and his ability to identify and capitalize on new opportunities. He also had a reputation for being a tough negotiator
Biography - Dhirubhai Ambani
title: Biography - Dhirubhai Ambani

Lets learn - Effective time management "Welcome, everyone! Today, we're going to talk about one of the most important skills we can learn: time management.
Life is precious, and time is the most valuable resource we have. It's something we can never get back once it's gone. So, it's crucial that we learn how to use it wisely.
When it comes to time management, it's all about setting goals and prioritizing our tasks. Start by identifying what's truly important to you, and make sure those things get done first.
One of the most effective ways to manage your time is to break down your tasks into smaller, more manageable chunks. This will help you stay focused and avoid feeling overwhelmed.
Another important aspect of time management is learning to say no. We can't do everything, and it's okay to turn down opportunities that don't align with our goals or priorities.
Remember, time is a non-renewable resource, so use it wisely. Prioritize your tasks, break them down into smaller chunks, and learn to say no to the things that don't matter. With these strategies, you'll be able to make the most of every moment and achieve your goals.
So, let's make the most of our time. Let's set our sights high and chase our dreams with all we've got. Because when it comes down to it, time is all we really have. Let's make the most of it!"
Lets learn - Effective time management
title: Lets learn - Effective time management

Motivational story - Believe in yourself, never give up Once upon a time, in a small village, there was a young girl named Sarah. Sarah was a hardworking and determined girl, but she had always been told that she could never achieve her dreams because of her humble background and limited resources.
Despite this, Sarah never gave up on her dreams. She spent every free moment studying and learning, determined to prove everyone wrong.
One day, Sarah heard about a prestigious school in the city that offered scholarships to talented and hardworking students like herself. With nothing to lose, she decided to apply.
The application process was long and difficult, but Sarah persisted. She poured her heart and soul into her application, and after weeks of waiting, she finally received a letter in the mail.
It was an acceptance letter to the school! Sarah was overjoyed and couldn't believe that her hard work had paid off.
But the journey wasn't over yet. The school was in the city and Sarah's family couldn't afford the expenses. However, Sarah didn't let that stop her. She worked hard to save up money and found a part-time job to help cover the costs.
Through determination and hard work, Sarah was able to attend the school and graduate with honors. She was the first person in her village to attend the prestigious school and she made a name for herself in the city.
Years later, Sarah returned to her village as a successful and accomplished individual, and she shared her story with the young people of her village. She told them that they too could achieve their dreams, no matter their background or resources.
Through her own determination, Sarah had shown that with hard work and perseverance, anything is possible.
The moral of the story is that no matter where you come from, or what obstacles you may face, with hard work and perseverance, you can achieve your dreams. So, believe in yourself, never give up, and chase your dreams with all you've got.
Motivational story - Believe in yourself, never give up
title: Motivational story - Believe in yourself, never give up

Motivational story on time management Once upon a time, in a far-off land, there lived a young prince named Alexander. Alexander was a kind and ambitious prince who had a great desire to rule his kingdom well and bring prosperity to his people.
However, Alexander was also very lazy and often found himself wasting time on frivolous activities. He would sleep late, procrastinate on important tasks, and spend hours on end playing games and talking with his friends.
One day, an old wise man visited the kingdom and saw how Alexander was wasting his time. He approached Alexander and said, "Your Highness, you have a great destiny ahead of you. But if you continue to waste your time, you will never achieve your goals and bring prosperity to your people."
The wise man went on to teach Alexander the importance of setting goals, prioritizing his tasks, and breaking them down into smaller, more manageable chunks. He also taught Alexander to say no to the things that didn't matter and to focus on what was truly important.
Alexander took the wise man's words to heart and began to change his ways. He set a schedule for himself, prioritized his tasks, and focused on what was truly important. He also learned to say no to the things that didn't matter and to focus on what was truly important.
As a result, Alexander's kingdom began to prosper. He was able to complete important projects and make important decisions that brought prosperity to his people. The people loved him and he was respected by all.
From that day on, Alexander was known as the prince who had the wisdom to manage his time well and bring prosperity to his people. He lived a happy and fulfilled life, and his kingdom was a shining example to all.
The moral of the story is that time is a precious resource, and it's important that we learn to use it wisely. By setting goals, prioritizing our tasks, breaking them down into smaller chunks, and learning to say no to the things that don't matter, we can achieve our goals and live a fulfilling life.
Motivational story on time management

What is Kafka? What is Kafka producer and consumer? Apache Kafka is a distributed streaming platform that is used for building real-time data pipelines and streaming applications. It is designed to handle large volumes of data with low latency, and allows for the storage and processing of streams of records in a fault-tolerant way.
A Kafka producer is a program or application that sends data to a Kafka cluster. Producers send data to topics, which are like channels or streams that the data is sent to. Producers can send data in real-time or in batches.
A Kafka consumer is a program or application that reads data from a Kafka cluster. Consumers subscribe to topics and process the data that is sent to them. Consumers can process data in real-time or in batches.
What is Kafka? What is Kafka producer and consumer?
title: What is Kafka? What is Kafka producer and consumer?

What is Upwork’s “Rising Talent” program? What are the conditions to get this badge? Upwork's "Rising Talent" program is a feature that helps businesses and clients easily find and hire highly skilled and experienced freelancers on the platform. These freelancers have been vetted by Upwork and have demonstrated exceptional skill and experience in their field. They also have a higher likelihood of delivering quality work and maintaining a positive client relationship.
To qualify for the Rising Talent program, freelancers must meet certain requirements, such as having a high job success rate, positive client feedback, and a good number of hours worked on Upwork. They also need to have a complete and well-written profile, including a portfolio of their work, and they must pass a skills test relevant to their field of work.
Freelancers in the Rising Talent program are highlighted in search results and have a special badge on their profile to indicate their status. This makes it easier for clients to find and hire them.
If you are an employer looking for a freelancer and want to find the rising talent, you can use the search feature on Upwork to filter for freelancers in the Rising Talent program, and you can also sort by job success rate, feedback, and hours worked to find the most qualified freelancers for your project.
What is Upwork's "Rising Talent" program? What are the conditions to get this badge?

How to build image generator app? Building an image generator app involves several steps, including:
Define the purpose and functionality of the app: Determine the specific use case and features that the image generator app should have. For example, the app could generate images based on user input or create unique images using machine learning algorithms.Choose a programming language and framework: Decide on the programming language and framework that will be used to build the app. Some popular choices for building image generation apps include Python, JavaScript, and TensorFlow.Gather and preprocess the data: Collect and prepare the data that will be used to train the image generation model. This could include images, text, or other data that will be used to generate the images.Train the model: Use the collected data to train the image generation model. This could involve using machine learning techniques such as deep learning or generative models.Implement the user interface: Design and build the user interface for the app, which should allow users to input data, generate images, and view the results.Test and debug the app: Test the app to ensure that it functions as intended and fix any bugs or errors that are found.Deploy the app: Once the app is complete, it can be deployed and made available to users. This could involve hosting the app on a website or mobile app store, or making it available as a standalone application.It's a broad process and requires knowledge of programming, machine learning, and image processing.
How to build image generator app?

10 tips for time management Time management is the process of planning and organizing how to spend the hours in a day to effectively accomplish tasks and meet goals. Here are some tips for effective time management:
Prioritize your tasks: Make a to-do list and prioritize tasks based on importance and urgency.Set specific goals: Set specific, measurable, and achievable goals for the tasks you need to complete.Use a calendar: Use a calendar to schedule your tasks and set reminders.Avoid multitasking: Try to focus on one task at a time, as multitasking can decrease productivity and increase stress.Eliminate distractions: Identify and eliminate sources of distractions, such as social media or email notifications.Take regular breaks: Take regular breaks to rest and recharge, and avoid burnout.Delegate tasks: Delegate tasks to others when possible to reduce workload and increase efficiency.Use time-saving techniques: Use time-saving techniques such as templates, shortcuts, and automation to increase productivity.Learn to say no: Learn to say no to unnecessary or unimportant tasks and commitments.Review and Reflect: Regularly review your progress and reflect on your time management strategies, making adjustments as necessary.Time management is a skill that can be developed and practiced, and it can also be influenced by personal habits and behaviors. Therefore it is important to evaluate yourself periodically, identify your strengths and areas for improvement, and make adjustments as necessary.
10 tips for time management
title: 10 tips for time management

contents:
How to remain focused towards your goal? Staying focused on your goals can be challenging, but there are several strategies that can help:
Set clear and specific goals: Make sure your goals are clear and specific, and that you understand what you need to do to achieve them.Create a plan: Create a plan of action that includes the steps you need to take to achieve your goals.Prioritize: Prioritize your tasks based on importance and urgency, and focus on the most important tasks first.Eliminate distractions: Identify and eliminate sources of distractions, such as social media or email notifications.Stay motivated: Remind yourself of the reasons why you set your goal and what you stand to gain by achieving it.Celebrate small wins: Celebrate small wins along the way, it will help to keep you motivated and on track.Stay accountable: Tell someone about your goal and ask them to hold you accountable for making progress.Flexibility: Be flexible, if something doesn't work out, adjust your plan and try a different approach.Reward yourself: Reward yourself when you achieve a milestone, it can be a small treat, a day off or anything that makes you feel good.Reflect: Reflect on your progress regularly, evaluate what's working and what's not, and make adjustments as necessary.Remember, achieving a goal takes time and effort. It's important to be patient and persistent, and not to get discouraged if you encounter obstacles along the way. Keep in mind that setbacks and failures are normal parts of the process and you can learn and grow from them.
How to remain focused towards your goal?
title: How to remain focused towards your goal?

Top 25 Python libraries Here are some of the most popular Python libraries, organized by category:
NumPy - a library for the Python programming language, adding support for large, multi-dimensional arrays and matrices, along with a large collection of high-level mathematical functions to operate on these arrays.pandas - a library providing fast, flexible, and expressive data structures designed to make working with "relational" or "labeled" data both easy and intuitive. It aims to be the fundamental high-level building block for doing practical, real world data analysis in Python.Matplotlib - a plotting library for the Python programming language and its numerical mathematics extension NumPy. It provides an object-oriented API for embedding plots into applications using general-purpose GUI toolkits like Tkinter, wxPython, Qt, or GTK.TensorFlow - an open-source software library for dataflow and differentiable programming across a range of tasks. It is a symbolic math library, and is also used for machine learning applications such as neural networks.scikit-learn - a library for the Python programming language that implements a range of machine learning, pre-processing, cross-validation and visualization algorithms using a unified interface.PyTorch - an open source machine learning library based on the Torch library. It is used for applications such as natural language processing.OpenCV - a library of programming functions mainly aimed at real-time computer vision.Seaborn - a library for making statistical graphics in Python. It is built on top of Matplotlib and closely integrated with the data structures from pandas.Keras - a user-friendly neural network library written in Python. It is capable of running on top of TensorFlow, Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit or Theano.NLTK - a leading platform for building Python programs to work with human language data.Pygame - a set of Python modules designed for writing video games.Flask - a micro web framework written in Python. It is classified as a microframework because it does not require particular tools or libraries.Beautiful Soup - a Python package for parsing HTML and XML documents. It creates parse trees from XML or HTML that is helpful to extract the data easily.Requests - a simple HTTP library for Python, built for human beings.Django - a high-level Python web framework that enables rapid development of secure and maintainable websites.PyQt - a set of Python bindings for the Qt application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt including Windows, OS X, Linux, iOS, and Android.NetworkX - a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.Pygal - a Python SVG Charts Creator, which helps to create a variety of charts.Pyglet - a cross-platform windowing and multimedia library for Python.Scrapy - an open-source and collaborative web crawling framework for Python.PyAutoGUI - a Python module for automating GUI interactions to aid in the automation of testing or other repetitive tasks.PySerial - a library for serial communication in Python.Pytest - a library for testing Python code.PyYAML - a YAML parser and emitter for Python.SymPy - a Python library for symbolic mathematics.
Top 25 Python libraries
title: Top 25 Python libraries

A powerful processor (such as an Intel Core i7 or i9) for running computationally intensive tasks.A large amount of RAM (at least 16GB or more) for handling large data sets.A dedicated GPU (such as an NVIDIA or AMD) for accelerating machine learning and deep learning tasks.A large storage capacity (such as a solid state drive with at least 512GB of storage) for storing data sets and models.Good thermals and cooling to handle high workloads.A good build quality and robustness as data science often involves a lot of travel.Additionally, it should run Linux or Windows 10. Why daily journaling is important? Daily journaling can be an effective tool for self-reflection, problem-solving, and personal growth. Here are some reasons why daily journaling can be important:
Helps to organize thoughts: Writing down your thoughts and feelings can help to organize them and make sense of them.Increases self-awareness: Journaling can help to increase self-awareness and provide insight into your thoughts, feelings, and behaviors.Improves mental health: Journaling can help to reduce symptoms of stress, anxiety, and depression, and improve overall mental well-being.Facilitates problem-solving: Journaling can help to identify and work through problems and challenges by providing a safe space to explore and process thoughts and feelings.Enhances creative thinking: journaling can help to generate new ideas and perspectives, and enhance creative thinking.Provides a sense of accomplishment: Journaling can help to set and track goals, and provide a sense of accomplishment when you see progress over time.Helps to prioritize: Journaling can help you to identify what's important and prioritize what needs to be done.Aids in decision-making: Journaling can help to clarify thoughts and feelings, and aid in decision-making.A tool for reflection: Journaling can be a tool for reflection and introspection, helping you to learn more about yourself and your experiences.A record of growth: Journaling can be a record of your personal growth, and a way to look back on your journey and celebrate your accomplishments.It is important to note that the benefits of journaling can be enhanced by making it a daily habit, and that journaling can be done in various forms such as written, audio, or video. Also, it's important to remember that journaling is a personal experience and there is no right or wrong way to do it, as long as it is beneficial for you.
Why daily journaling is important?
title: Why daily journaling is important?

Why we should take excercise daily? Exercise is an important part of maintaining overall health and well-being. Here are some reasons why taking exercise daily can be beneficial:
Improves cardiovascular health: Regular exercise can help to improve circulation, lower blood pressure and cholesterol levels, and reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke.Helps to maintain a healthy weight: Exercise can help to burn calories and maintain a healthy weight.Improves mental health: Exercise can help to reduce stress, anxiety and depression, and improve overall mental well-being.Increases muscle strength and tone: Exercise can help to improve muscle strength and tone, which can improve overall physical function.Improves bone health: Exercise can help to maintain bone density and reduce the risk of osteoporosis.Increases flexibility and balance: Exercise can help to improve flexibility and balance, which can be especially beneficial for older adults.Improves sleep: Exercise can help to improve sleep quality and reduce insomnia.Boosts energy levels: Regular exercise can help to boost energy levels and improve overall physical fitness.Improves immune system function: Regular exercise can help to boost the immune system and promote overall health and well-being.Enhances overall sense of well-being: Exercise can have positive effects on mood, cognitive function, and overall sense of well-being.It is important to note that the benefits of exercise are most pronounced when it's done regularly and at a moderate to vigorous intensity, and it's also important to consult with a doctor before starting a new exercise routine. Regular exercise should be part of a healthy lifestyle, along with a balanced diet, adequate sleep, and stress management.
Why we should take excercise daily?
title: Why we should take excercise daily?

contents:
Top 10 Indian Movies We are a country that loves movies. We love our cinema and we love our films. In India, there are many different genres of movies that can be watched by every kind of audience. From action-packed thrillers to heartwarming romances, from underworld crime dramas to family comedies, from biopics about historical figures to superhero movies - there's something for everyone!
1. DangalDangal is a 2016 Indian biographical sports drama film directed by Nitesh Tiwari and produced by Bhushan Kumar and Mukesh Bhatt under the banner of UTV Motion Pictures. It stars Aamir Khan as Mahavir Singh Phogat, who taught wrestling to his daughters Geeta Phogat and Babita Kumari in rural Haryana, India during 1977–1984. The film tells their story from childhood to adulthood with incidents from their lives interspersed throughout the movie. The script was written by Vicky Chandhok, Rajkumar Hirani (writer), Apoorva Mehta (screenplay), Raju Hirani (screenwriter) and Abhishek Chaubey.[6]
2. PKPK is a 2014 Indian satirical science fiction comedy film directed by Rajkumar Hirani and written by Hirani and Abhijat Joshi. The film is produced by Hirani, Vidhu Vinod Chopra and Siddharth Roy Kapur. It features an ensemble cast including Anil Kapoor, Ranveer Singh, Kareena Kapoor Khan and Arshad Warsi in lead roles; with Priyanka Chopra playing the role of Anil's wife Paro, Parmish Verma as Govinda Bhalla's father Bauua Singh (known as "Gopi"), Rishi Kapoor as Sanjay Dutt's father Mr Kaur, Ritesh Deshmukh as Amitabh Bachchan's brother Aryan Banerjee (known as "Aryan"), Kangana Ranaut as Vidya Balan's sister Rutvi Kaur (known as "Rutvi").The story revolves around two boys--one named PK or Pkumar Gill (played by Anil Kapoor) who can see into another dimension called afterlife through black magic while his friend Sidhu(played by Ranveer Singh) is born without any special powers whatsoever but has been shown using some kind of martial arts skills during their childhood/teenage years before they reach adulthood together later on in life when they start working together professionally under the same roof at a company called H2O Incorporated based out of Mumbai India where they have offices located there too along with other employees such as Mr Suman Lakhia who works closely alongside them both during their daily commutes back home after working hours end each day until closing time comes around midnight every night which means job security comes first before anything else does...
3. Bajrangi BhaijaanBajrangi Bhaijaan is a 2015 Indian family drama film directed by Kabir Khan, starring Salman Khan and Anushka Sharma. It tells the story of an eight-year-old Pakistani girl who travels to India in search of her mother.The film received a wide release on Eid al-Adha week in 2015.[1] It became one of the highest grossing Indian films at box office with over ₹200 crore (US$30 million) collected worldwide after its theatrical run ended.[2][3][4] The film won several awards including Best Film at 55th National Film Awards,[5] Best Actor for Salman Khan at 59th Filmfare Awards,[6] Best Direction for Kabir Khan at 61st Zee Cine Award's South awards,[7] as well as Best Director for Kabir Khan.[8][9][10].4. 3 idiotsStarring Aamir Khan, the movie was directed by Rajkumar Hirani and released in 2009. The story revolves around four students who go to college for the first time and learn about life in general, as well as themselves. It was a huge success at the box office and has been seen by many as one of Aamir's best performances.
5. SanjuSanju is a biopic of actor Sanjay Dutt, who was born to film actors Sunil Dutt and Nargis Dutt. The film chronicles the life of the actor from his early days as an actor in Mumbai to his later years when he became involved in controversies surrounding money laundering and corruption charges which led to him spending time behind bars for six years.
The movie stars Ranbir Kapoor as Sanjay Dutt, who plays himself in many scenes throughout this movie along with Anushka Sharma playing Nargis Dutt (Sanjay's mother).
6. Secret SuperstarSecret Superstar is a 2017 Indian musical drama film directed by Advait Chandan and written by Prateek Sharma, Piyush Mishra and Paresh Rawal. The film stars Zaira Wasim, Meher Vij, Aamir Khan, Rajkummar Rao and Divya Dutta in lead roles. It is based on the life story of Geeta Dutt (1937 – 1978), who became an international sensation as playback singer during the 1960s.[1][2][3]
The film received positive reviews from critics but failed to meet financial expectations at box office.[4] It won multiple awards including Best Film at Filmfare Awards 2018.[5][6]
7. SultanSultan is a sports drama film, directed by Ali Abbas Zafar and starring Salman Khan and Anushka Sharma. It was released on 6 July 2016.
The film begins with a woman named Rani (Anushka Sharma) who has been cheated out of her inheritance by her uncle and cousin, who have taken over their father's business empire. She decides to take revenge on them by becoming impregnated with their child so that she can give birth to a son who will become the next king of their country.
8. M.S DhoniIf you’re a cricket fan, this movie is for you. M.S Dhoni is based on the life of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni and was released in 2016. The film was directed by Neeraj Pandey and stars Sushant Singh Rajput as the titular character.
It has grossed $84.5 million worldwide since its release, making it one of India's most successful films ever made!
9. kabir singhKabir Singh is a 2015 Hindi-language biographical film directed by Anurag Kashyap. The film is based on the life of real-life Indian terrorist, Kalyan Singh,[1] who was convicted for terrorism and sentenced to death before being acquitted on appeal.[2][3] It stars Rajkummar Rao in the title role as Kabir Singh, alongside Divya Dutta and Emraan Hashmi as other members of his family. It was released on 7 December 2015 to positive reviews with critics praising its performances by all three leads.[4][5][6]
10. Bajirao MastaniBajirao Mastani is a 2015 Indian epic historical drama film directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali and written by Abhishek Verma. It features Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone in the lead roles with Priyanka Chopra, Jim Sarbh and Anupam Kher playing supporting roles. The film is based on the life of Peshwa Bajirao I (1674–1730), who played an important role in the Maratha Empire during its expansion under his rule. The plot revolves around him being sent on a mission to defeat Ibrahim Adil Shah II (1656–1680).
ConclusionThese are the best Indian movies. We hope you've enjoyed our list, and if you have any other ideas for a movie that should be included on this list, let us know!

What are the benefits of meditation? Meditation is a practice that involves focusing the mind on a particular object, thought, or activity to achieve a mentally clear and emotionally calm state. There are many different forms of meditation, but some of the main benefits include:
Reduced stress and anxiety: Meditation can help to reduce stress and anxiety by promoting relaxation and calm.Improved mood: Meditation can help to improve mood and increase feelings of happiness and well-being.Increased self-awareness: Meditation can help to increase self-awareness and self-understanding, which can lead to greater insight and personal growth.Improved focus and concentration: Meditation can help to improve focus and concentration, which can be beneficial for work, school, and other activities.Improved sleep: Meditation can help to improve sleep quality and reduce insomnia.Reduced symptoms of depression: Meditation can help to reduce symptoms of depression, and improve overall mental health.Improved immune system: Meditation can help to boost the immune system and promote overall health and well-being.Improved cardiovascular health: Meditation can help to lower blood pressure, improve circulation and reduce the risk of heart disease.Increased empathy and compassion: Meditation can help to increase empathy and compassion towards others.Increased mindfulness: Meditation can help to increase mindfulness and awareness, helping individuals to be more present in the moment and less reactive to stress.It is important to note that the benefits of meditation can be enhanced by practicing regularly and consistently, and that some people may need to try different forms of meditation to find the one that works best for them. It is also important to consult with a doctor before starting a new practice if you have any health concerns.
What are the benefits of meditation?
title: What are the benefits of meditation?

What are the benefits of Yoga? Yoga is a form of exercise that combines physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation. It has a wide range of benefits for both physical and mental health. Some of the main benefits of yoga include:
Improved flexibility: Yoga postures can help to increase flexibility and mobility in the joints, muscles and tendons.Increased strength: Yoga postures can help to build strength and muscle tone, particularly in the core, arms and legs.Improved balance: Yoga postures can help to improve balance and coordination, which can be especially beneficial for older adults.Improved breathing: Yoga breathing techniques can help to improve lung capacity and increase oxygen flow to the body.Reduced stress: Yoga can help to reduce stress and tension in the body, as well as promote relaxation and a sense of calm.Improved sleep: Yoga can help to improve sleep quality and reduce insomnia.Improved cardiovascular health: Yoga can help to lower blood pressure, improve circulation and reduce the risk of heart disease.Improved immune system: Regular yoga practice can help to boost the immune system and promote overall health and well-being.Improved mental health: Yoga can help to reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression, and improve overall mental health.Increased mindfulness: Yoga can help to increase mindfulness and awareness, helping individuals to be more present in the moment and less reactive to stress.
What are the benefits of Yoga?

Why we should walk daily? Walking is a simple and low-impact form of exercise that can provide many health benefits. Some of the main reasons why walking daily is beneficial include:
Improves cardiovascular health: Regular walking can help to improve circulation, lower blood pressure and cholesterol levels, and reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke.Helps to maintain a healthy weight: Walking can help to burn calories and maintain a healthy weight.Improves mental health: Walking can help to reduce stress, anxiety and depression, and improve overall mental well-being.Increases muscle strength and tone: Walking can help to improve muscle strength and tone, particularly in the legs and core.Improves bone health: Walking can help to maintain bone density and reduce the risk of osteoporosis.Increases flexibility and balance: Walking can help to improve flexibility and balance, which can be especially beneficial for older adults.Enhances your mood and sense of well-being: Walking outside can expose you to natural light, fresh air, and greenery that can improve mood, reduce stress, and improve mental well-being.Convenient and easy to do: Walking is a convenient and easy form of exercise that can be done anywhere and at any time.Low-impact: Walking is a low-impact exercise that is easy on the joints and suitable for people of all ages and fitness levels.Cost-effective: Walking is a free form of exercise that requires no special equipment or gym membership.It is important to note that the benefits of walking are most pronounced when it's done regularly and at a moderate to vigorous intensity, and also to consult with a doctor before starting a new exercise routine.
Why we should walk daily?

Bhogali Bihu When to celeberate Bhogali Bihu?
Bhogali Bihu, also known as Maghi Bihu, is a festival celebrated by the people of Assam, India. It is a harvest festival and is typically celebrated in the month of January, usually around the time of the full moon day of the month of Magh (January-February) as per the traditional Assamese Calendar. The festival marks the end of the harvest season and is a time for people to enjoy the fruits of their labor and to give thanks for a bountiful harvest. During the festival, people light bonfires, prepare traditional foods, and participate in cultural activities and games.
How to celeberate Bhogali Bihu?
Bhogali Bihu is a traditional festival celebrated by the people of Assam, India. There are several ways to celebrate the festival, which include:
1) Lighting of Meji: A traditional bonfire is lit on the evening of the festival, known as "Meji", which is made by stacking up wood, bamboo and hay.
2) Food: Traditional Assamese food is prepared and consumed, such as pitha (a type of rice cake), laru (a type of sweet), and til pitha (a sesame seed and rice cake).
3) Cultural activities: Bihu dance and singing are performed by the young people in traditional dress, also traditional sports like buffalo fighting, cock fighting, boat racing and bull racing are organized in rural areas.
4) Community feast: A community feast known as "Bhog" is organized by the villagers where everyone is invited to partake in the feast.
5) Pitha Utsav: A Pitha Utsav is organized where different types of traditional rice cakes are prepared and offered to the deity.
6) Giving: People give gifts to their friends and family, specially to the elderly and the poor, and also offer to the temple.
7) Fireworks:People light fireworks to mark the end of the harvest season, and to celebrate the festival.
Note that the above mentioned customs and rituals may vary in different regions and communities and may not be practiced by all the people.
Bhogali Bihu
title: Bhogali Bihu

Stacer - Linux System Optimizer and Monitoring Stacer is a system optimizer and monitoring tool for Linux systems. It allows users to view and manage system resources such as CPU, RAM, and disk usage, as well as startup applications and system services. Additionally, it provides options to clean up and optimize the system, such as removing unnecessary files and programs, managing system services, and monitoring system performance. Stacer is used to improve system performance, increase stability and free up resources.
Stacer has several features that are designed to optimize and monitor Linux systems. Some of the key features include:
1. System Information: Displays detailed information about the system, including CPU usage, RAM usage, disk usage, and system uptime.
2. Startup Applications: Allows users to manage and control the applications that start automatically when the system boots up.
3. System Services: Provides a list of all system services and allows users to start, stop, or restart them.
4. Process Manager: A Task Manager that allows users to view and manage running processes, including the ability to terminate processes, set priority level and filter by process name.
5. System Cleaner: Scans the system for unnecessary files and programs and allows users to delete them to free up space and improve performance.
6. System Optimizer: Provides options for optimizing the system, including a RAM cleaner and a system cleaner.
7. System Monitor: Allows users to monitor system performance in real-time, including CPU usage, RAM usage, and network usage.
8. Scheduled Tasks: Users can schedule tasks to run at specific times, such as cleaning the system or optimizing memory.
9. Uninstaller: Allows users to uninstall and remove software from the system
10. System Backup: Allows users to create backup of installed packages and configurations.
11. Other features include System Event Log, and software center to install new software
Sometimes after using the Stacer, you will face some issues - 
Error while starting apache2 "Cannot access directory '/var/log/apache2/' for main error log"
Solution - 
sudo mkdir -p /var/log/apache2/
sudo chmod -R 744 /var/log/apache2/
Stacer - Linux System Optimizer and Monitoring
title: Stacer - Linux System Optimizer and Monitoring

Who is Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav was an Indian wrestler and Olympic medalist. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland, where he won the bronze medal in the men's freestyle bantamweight category. He is considered as one of the greatest wrestlers in India and also known as "Pocket Dynamo" due to his small size and powerful wrestling skills.
Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav was an Indian wrestler and Olympian from Goleshwar, Kolhapur, Maharashtra. He competed in the 1952 Helsinki Olympics and won the bronze medal in the bantamweight category, becoming the first Indian wrestler to win an Olympic medal. He died in 1984.
Google on January 15, 2023 honoured Indian wrestler Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav, who won India her first individual Olympic medal after Independence at the 1952 Helsinki Olympics, on his 97th birth anniversary.
Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav was born on January 19, 1926, in the village of Goleshwar in the Kolhapur district of Maharashtra, India. He was a wrestler from a young age and began competing in local and regional tournaments. In the early 1950s, he began competing on the national level and quickly established himself as one of India's top wrestlers.
In 1952, Jadhav qualified for the Olympics and competed in the bantamweight category in the Helsinki Olympics, where he won the bronze medal becoming the first Indian wrestler to win an Olympic medal. He was unable to participate in the 1956 Olympics due to an injury.
After his Olympic success, Jadhav continued to compete in national and international wrestling tournaments. He retired from competitive wrestling in the 1960s, but remained involved in the sport as a coach and administrator. He died on August 14, 1984, at the age of 58. Despite his achievements, he did not receive much recognition during his lifetime, but later on he is considered as a legend in Indian wrestling and his achievements are celebrated in Maharashtra.
Who is Khashaba Dadasaheb Jadhav

How to pick high-demand products from amazon?  Here are a few ways to pick high-demand products from Amazon:
1. Best Seller list: Check the Amazon Best Seller list in the category of the product you're interested in. Products that are consistently on the list are likely to be in high demand.
2. Amazon search bar: Use the Amazon search bar to find products that have a high number of searches and a high number of sales.
3. Amazon reviews: Look for products with a high number of positive reviews and a high rating, as these are likely to be in high demand.
4. Amazon category list: Look for products that are listed in multiple categories, as this could be an indication of high demand.
5. Amazon's "Frequently Bought Together" : Look at the "Frequently bought together" section on product pages, it can give you an idea of which products are often purchased together.
6. Research on the internet: Research on the internet and on social media to find out what products are currently trending, and see if they're available on Amazon.
7. Use Amazon Sales Estimator Tools: Use Amazon sales estimator tools such as JungleScout, to get an estimate of the sales and revenue of a product, which can help you identify high-demand products.
8. Keep an eye on the competition: Keep an eye on what other affiliates and influencers are promoting, as this can give you an idea of what products are currently in high demand.
How to pick high-demand products from amazon?
title: How to pick high-demand products from amazon?

How to start email marketing?  There are several steps to starting an email marketing campaign:
1. Build a list of email addresses: You can collect email addresses from existing customers or website visitors, or purchase a list from a reputable provider.
2. Create a sign-up form: Use a sign-up form on your website or social media pages to collect email addresses.
3. Develop a strategy: Decide what type of content you will send to your subscribers and how often you will send it.
4. Create a template: Design an email template that is consistent with your brand and makes it easy for subscribers to read your content.
5. Test and send: Test your email campaign on a small group of people before sending it to your entire list.
6. Track results: Use email marketing software to track the performance of your campaign and make adjustments as needed.
7. Comply with laws: Make sure you comply with laws such as CAN-SPAM Act, GDPR and CASL.
Overall, it's important to have a clear understanding of your target audience and their preferences, as well as a well-defined goal for your campaign. With the right strategy, you can effectively use email marketing to reach and engage with your audience and drive conversions.
How to start email marketing?
title: How to start email marketing?
